kata_indonesia: posisi benda yang tampak mudah terjatuh

kalimat_besemah: Alahka cudil pule nepikka gedah tu, tengahka agi dikit!

kalimat_inggris: Don't put the glass on the edge of the table, please scroll to the middle!

kalimat_besemah: cughup Lawang Agung di Jarai, cughup Mangkuq di paraq kantur walikuta Pagar Alam, cughup Lematang di jalan ke Lahat, cughup Surmeke di Padang Guci

kalimat_inggris: Please talk to my father! He is not working now

kalimat_inggris: Have a rest at that ground

kalimat_inggris: Stand up on the pile of the soil!

kalimat_inggris: Why do you keep standing there?
